name: Related Celebrities 03 Multiple Choice Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 5 Questions

questions.text: You may know me by my book and movie 'Postcards From The Edge.' If not, you know me best as Princess Leia. Who am I?
I am the mother of number 1. I was married to Eddie Fisher and he left me for Elizabeth Taylor.
Eddie Fisher was also married to this actress. She appeared as Miss Mason in 'Grease 2'.
I was on a show with a limited life span. John Goodman and I are on 'Normal, Ohio'. I am the half-sister of number 1 and the child of number 3.
In 1983, before he married his current wife, Edie Brickell, he was married to Carrie Fisher for a VERY short time.
